content: आप्त {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} [आप्-क्त] {@--1@} Got, obtained, gained; °कामः, °शापः &c. {@--2@} Reached, overtaken, equalled. {@--3@} Reaching to, extending as far as. {@--4@} Trustworthy, reliable, credible (as news &c.). {@--5@} Trusty, confidential, faithful (person); <ls>R. 3. 12</ls>; <ls n="R.">5. 39</ls>; <ls>Ms. 8. 63.</ls> {@--6@} ({%a%}) Clever, skilful; प्राजकश्चेद्भवेदाप्तः <ls>Ms. 8. 294.</ls> ({%b%}) Apt, fit. {@--7@} Full, complete, abundant; यजेत राजा क्रतुभिर्विविधैराप्तदक्षिणैः <ls>Ms. 7. 79.</ls> {@--8@} True, exact. {@--9@} Intimate, closely related, acquainted; कन्यायाः किल पूजयंति पितरो जामातुराप्तं जनं <ls>U. 4. 17</ls> relatives; <ls>Ms. 5. 101.</ls> {@--10@} Appointed. {@--11@} Generally received, commonly used; authentic. {@--12@} Accused, prosecuted. {@--13@} Reasonable, sensible. --प्तः {@--1@} A trustworthy, reliable, or fit person; credible person or source, guarantee; आप्तः यथार्थवक्ता <ls>T. S.</ls> {@--2@} A relative, friend; निग्रहात्स्वसुराप्तानां वधाच्च धनदानुजः <ls>R. 12. 52</ls>; कथमाप्तवर्गोयं भवत्याः <ls>M. 5</ls>; <ls>Y. 1. 28</ls>, <ls n="Y.">2. 71</ls>; <ls>Ms. 2. 109</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">8. 64.</ls> {@--3@} An Arhat. --प्ता A twisted lock of hair. --प्तं {@--1@} A quotient. {@--2@} (In <ab>Math.</ab>) Equation of a degree.
